page.title: 14HOLMESFIELD SOCIAL AMENITIES
page.content: The majority of{social activities}are held in Holmesfield itself,many at the {Church Hall}or the{Parish Hall.}An over sixties club is provided by the Church and many local people attend . Regular monthly whist drives are organised and outings are also arranged.{Elderly people}are looked after by the{Good Neighbours}scheme which takes people to hospital and fetches prescriptions and shopping for sick people.Twice a week{doctors hold a surgery in the Church Hall. Various uniformed organisations meet at the Church and various charitable events are held.A local cricket club holds its matches in Millthorpe.An annual{'fun run'}takes place in Millthorpe to raise money for charity. This takes place in July and is accompanied by a sheep roast and a 'well dressing'.
